title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The nation of Wakanda is pitted against intervening world powers as they mourn the loss of their king T'Challa.

title: Shazam! Fury of the gods
description: Shazam and his newly formed team must come together to face a new threat .

title: Avatar: The Way Of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their planet.

title: Nope
description: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
description: A sequel to the 2019 film Knives Out

title: Black Adam
description: Nearly 5000 years after he was bestowed with the almighty powers of the Egyptian gods and imprisoned just as quickly, Black Adam (Johnson) is freed from his earthly tomb, ready to unleash his unique form of justice on the modern world.
